abstract: Chinese regulators ordered state-owned banks on Tuesday to set aside a larger share of their deposits as a reserve against failed loans, another in a string of indicators that Beijing is concerned about speculation in the nation’s fast-growing economy.
snippet: Chinese regulators ordered state-owned banks on Tuesday to set aside a larger share of their deposits as a reserve against failed loans, another in a string of indicators that Beijing is concerned about speculation in the nation’s fast-growing eco...
lead_paragraph: Chinese regulators ordered state-owned banks on Tuesday to set aside a larger share of their deposits as a reserve against failed loans, another in a string of indicators that Beijing is concerned about speculation in the nation’s fast-growing economy.

headline.main: To Curb Loans, China Tells Banks to Increase Reserves

abstract: BYD Auto of China, which counts Warren E. Buffett among its investors, created a stir by announcing that it plans to start selling an electric car in California by the end of this year.
snippet: BYD Auto of China, which counts Warren E. Buffett among its investors, created a stir by announcing that it plans to start selling an electric car in California by the end of this year.
lead_paragraph: After a disastrous year for the auto industry, carmakers are working hard to exude optimism and confidence at this year’s auto show.

headline.main: BYD Hopes to Offer Electric Car in U.S. This Year
